infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This application needs your permission to select photos from library.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This application needs your permission to open camera for taking photos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This application needs your permission to access your location while using the app.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This application needs your permission to access your audio input for video recording.
